author: Laurie Daykin
comment: Huawei Mate 8. Had difficulty first off. Once I'd set it up as per the instructions, it worked fine. Pity we can't get live pictures. But otherwise excellent app.

author: Screw Google
comment: No windows app - No points!  Why do you not make this app for Windows 10? Over 700 million people use windows 10 now, surely that must be enough users to motivate to make an app!  Even if only a Web-app in a wrapper! I will give you proper scoring when I find your app in the Microsoft Store.

author: The Ledgendary Lawnbringer
comment: Aika hidas sovellus mutta silti toimiva olisi mukava jos sovelluksen ja widgettien teeman voisi vaihtaa tummempaan

author: Simon Paag
comment: Mega dårlig udviklet app. Virker som noget rigtigt hjemmebikset amatør app-makværk. Kan ikke anbefales til nogen.

author: anthony børnes
comment: Doesn't work on my phone anymore now that i have changed to new phone Huawei Mate 10 pro.

author: Bobi Wan
comment: Appen är väldigt väldigt seg, framförallt vid uppstart.  Bildtagning tar mycket lång tid  Det borde finnas Panik/Larm knapp i appen.

author: Mega XLR
comment: Interface is lomp, performance is zelf op high end telefoons om te huilen en de tijd die het duurt on het systeem in te schakelen maakt kost me meer dan 4 minuten.

author: Ari Siukola
comment: Please create an app for Samsung smart watches. Otherwise good application. Also it would be great to have Smart buttons on the Status view so that one can trigger the buttons easier and faster e.g. lights via Smart Plugs.

author: christiano braem
comment: Missing Betteridge uw experience,some feature are not.working on app

author: jimmy hansen
comment: Nice app . please add fingerprint support for opening the Yale  door instead of pin code. Could be quicker

author: J.Y Li
comment: Please make a tizen os app for Samsung watches

author: Nym Anno
comment: Suddenly push notifications do not work anymore. Please fix this ASAP.

author: Lars Petter Skeie
comment: Funker noen ganger. Smart funksjoner fungerer en gang iblant. Nå ofte så av manuelt til tross for kodete smartkontakter.
title: Smart Home = Dumb home

author: PWR Dassen
comment: Deze app doet niks terwijl ik 1000 euro voor het systeem heb betaald. Werkt alleen met abbonnement a 35 euro per maand. Let op voordat je begint aan Verisure! Het systeem is niet van jou ondanks dat je ervoor betaald hebt!
title: Flut bedrijf

author: Kai Eberle
comment: Old notifications are not removed or replaced. Who is interested in obsolete notifications?
title: Notifications

author: Zachariah Baker
comment: Broken app. With bad service

author: Ole Grenaker
comment: Trenger store forbedringer. Virker veldig uferdig. Kan ikke bytte meldingstone engang. "Om" informasjonen ser ikke bra ut.

author: Gerrit Schol
comment: Handy to keep an eye on the house from a distance

author: Jonas Anden
comment: From the notifications, it is not possble to see if the alarm is armed away or armed stay. And the app takes a very long time to start.
title: Notifications are ambiguous, long startup time

author: Mazdak Farrokhzad
comment: Good enough, but it would be much better if you could unlock the alarm automatically on entering the SSID... just encrypt the password sent to the VBox in RAM for security so that it will go away once the device is powered off.

author: A Google User
comment: I would appreciate, though, if I could see the pictures taken when the alarm goes off.
title: Works like a charm!

author: shenaz200
comment: Picture always freezes when you to try to contact them they get back to you late
title: Shenaz

author: Anders Madsen
comment: Need IFTTT or the like integration so we can control other systems like Philips Hue lights,  thermostats etc... Also missing a door lock status widget

author: Walter Hoff
comment: Please add a widget for unlocking Doorman locks.
title: Need widget for unlocking the door

author: Kim Kaspersen
comment: It works. Edit: Widget stoppet working.
title: Great

author: Vincent Nikkelen
comment: Works without problems

author: Manny Grewal
comment: Perfect

author: Martin Alexander Sallfeldt
comment: I do not understand why the app does not display the level of humidity but the information is displayed when entering "my pages" on the web? As far as I can recall it used to be displayed in the app as well before.
title: Where is the humidity information?

author: Jonas Lundqvist
comment: There are som minor annoyances. For instance when looking at a climate diagram; pushing the phones back button SHOULD do the same as the top back button in the app, ie taking the user back to the climat overview. Not quiting the application.
title: Overall quite good

author: Erik Bergendorff
comment: Not compatible with Marshmallow doze at the moment which severely delays push messages from time to time. This is an easy code fix that should be implemented right away. Otherwise the app works great.
title: Problem with Marshmallow doze

author: Samuel Hearne
comment: Receiving constant errors and "verdisure has stopped working" messages. Used to work fine
title: Constant errors

author: Jo Dekelver
comment: Android wear support,  awesome! Does not work on dev preview of android M. Crashes as soon as I open it.

author: Jan Ihrstad Lunde
comment: Ønsker muligheter for å endre varslingslyd på forskjellige events.

author: Alessandro Mordacci
comment: What to say more?
title: Does what it says it does

author: Magnus Borgström
comment: ...but no info on why?
title: New permissions required...

author: Kent Vold
comment: Simple and nice.
title: Nice

author: Mikael Rönnkvist
comment: The widget don't syncronize with your alarm system, or the app itself. For example if you disarm then you get a notification on your phone, but the widget don't refresh itself, so you have to open the app to see actual status.
title: Widget don't work

author: Tobias Axelsson
comment: Widgets funkar och uppdateras automatiskt. Appen har alla funktioner jag kan komma på att jag behöver. Det som skulle vara bra är direktåtkomst till kameran.
title: Mycket bra

author: Ulf Sellergren
comment: Works now :)
title: White screen after latest update (fixed)

author: Timo Yli-Hemmo
comment: New widgets are crap...
